dhp334:3: plavatī → plavati (bj); palavatī (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed); palavetī (mr); uplavatī (?)
dhp339:3: Mahāvahanti → vāhā vahanti (bj, cck, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed)
dhp340:2: uppajja → ubbhijja (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed)
dhp343:4: Ākaṅkhanta → bhikkhu ākaṅkhī (bj); bhikkhu ākaṅkhaṃ (sya-all); bhikkhu ākaṃkha (pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed)
dhp345:2: dārujapabbajañca → dārujaṃ babbajañca (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); dārujaṃ pabbajañca (sya-all, pts-vp-pli2ed)
